personalInfo.education: McLennan Community College; Sam Houston State University (2012, Kinesiology)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Finished T135 at Web.com Tour Q-School in December...Played five events on PGA Tour Canada and made one cut. 

2013: Adams Tour Rookie of the Year.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was the 2009 National Junior College champion. Earned 2012 second-team All-Southland Conference honors. Won two collegiate titles.
tourBios.personal: Favorite music group is Florida Georgia Line. Favorite course to play is Carlton Woods and is a big fan of the NFL's Houston Texans...Would like to trade places with Rory McIlroy for a day...Met LeBron James in a hotel in San Antonio, his biggest brush with fame...Dream foursome would include Tiger Woods, Bubba Watson and Payne Stewart...Not many people know he is afraid to be outside by himself at night...Favorite motto is "Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard."...Has a lucky necklace and ball marker...Favorite movies include "Taken," "Shooter," "Tin Cup" and "The Blind Side." ...Biggest thrill outside golf is riding roller coasters...If he weren't playing professional golf he would be a high school or college golf coach, and he says his biggest thrill in golf is being in the hunt with a few holes to play...Twitter handle is @g_drive1.

tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Finished T26 at Canada's Q-School with rounds of 67-72-78-71.

2013: Played Adams Tour and earned Rookie of the Year honors. Won the Victoria Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Member of 2009 National Junior College National Championship team at McLennan Community College (Texas)...Later transferred to Sam Houston State, where he was second-team All-Southland Conference as a senior in 2012.
tourBios.personal: Twitter account is @G_Drive1...Lists riding rollercoasters as biggest thrill outside golf...Favorite teams are Sam Houston State, the Houston Texans and the Miami Heat...Favorite athlete is LeBron James, and his favorite city is Austin, Texas...Superstitions on the golf course include a lucky necklace and special coins.
